Gabelli Funds and Performance

Gabelli Funds is a prominent investment management firm led by Marc Gabelli, known for its focus on value investing and its diverse range of mutual funds. The firm’s funds cater to a wide spectrum of investors, with a primary emphasis on delivering long-term capital appreciation.

  • Gabelli Utility Fund (GBLIX): This fund invests in utility companies, including electric, gas, and water utilities. Its target market includes investors seeking income and stability, as utilities tend to provide consistent dividends and relatively stable earnings.
